---
title: "All Articles"
listing:
  contents: 
    - "2023/**/*.qmd"
    - "2024/**/*.qmd"
    - "2025/**/*.qmd"
  sort: "date desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  fields: [date, title, author, description, categories]
  page-size: 100
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: false
---

```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () {
    const applyHashFilter = () => {
        const hash = decodeURIComponent(window.location.hash);
        if (hash) {
            let filterValue = "";
            if (hash.startsWith("#author=")) {
                filterValue = hash.replace("#author=", "");
            } else if (hash.startsWith("#category=")) {
                filterValue = hash.replace("#category=", "");
            }

            if (filterValue) {
                // Poll for the search box appearing in the DOM
                const checkExist = setInterval(function() {
                    // Try to find Quarto's listing search box
                    const searchInput = document.querySelector('.quarto-listing-search .search') || document.querySelector('input.search');
                    
                    if (searchInput) {
                        console.log("Found search input, setting filter to:", filterValue);
                        searchInput.value = filterValue;
                        searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true }));
                        searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('keyup', { bubbles: true }));
                        searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('change', { bubbles: true }));
                        clearInterval(checkExist);
                    } else {
                        console.log("Waiting for search input...");
                    }
                }, 100); // Check every 100ms
                
                // Stop checking after 5 seconds to prevent memory leaks
                setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkExist), 5000);
            }
        }
    };

    // Apply on load
    applyHashFilter();

    // Apply on hash change
    window.addEventListener("hashchange", applyHashFilter);
});
</script>
```
